resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Salisbury Dragon: A standard in the Roman, the illuminator depicts it as a creature in its own right, spitting flames. Bipedal with a mouth like the bow of a drakkar.
resource.chars: Salisbury Dragon: A standard in the Roman, the illuminator depicts it as a creature in its own right, spitting flames. Bipedal with a mouth like the bow of a drakkar.
